Method Detail

writeCssInclude

void writeCssInclude(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request,
                     com.day.cq.wcm.api.designer.Design design,
                     PageRegion pageRegion,
                     Writer writer)
                     throws IOException
Writes the CSS include snippets to the given writer. The paths to the CSS libraries are included that match the given categories for client libraries (as specified on the Design page) associated with the pageRegion for the currentDesign

Parameters:
request - Sling Request obj
design - the Design to look up appropriate client libs from (usually currentDesign)
pageRegion - PageRegion enum
writer - writer to output link and script tags to
Throws:
IOException

                    com.day.cq.wcm.api.designer.Design design,
                    PageRegion pageRegion,
                    Writer writer)
                    throws IOException
Writes the JS include snippets to the given writer. The paths to the JS libraries are included that match the given categories for client libraries (as specified on the Design page) associated with the pageRegion for the currentDesign

Parameters:
request - Sling Request obj
design - the Design to look up appropriate client libs from (usually currentDesign)
pageRegion - PageRegion enum

IOException

writeIncludes

void writeIncludes(org.apache.sling.api.SlingHttpServletRequest request,
                   com.day.cq.wcm.api.designer.Design design,
                   PageRegion pageRegion,
                   Writer writer)
                   throws IOException
Writes the include snippets to the given writer. The paths to the libraries (CSS and JS) are included that match the given categories for client libraries (as specified on the Design page) associated with the pageRegion for the currentDesign

Parameters:
request - Sling Request obj
design - the Design to look up appropriate client libs from (usually currentDesign)
pageRegion - PageRegion enum
writer - writer to output link and script tags to
Throws:
IOException

getCssLibraries

String[] getCssLibraries(com.day.cq.wcm.api.designer.Design design,
                         PageRegion pageRegion)
Returns an ordered list of all CSS (as specified on the Design page) client libraries associated with the pageRegion for the design

Parameters:
design - the Design to look up appropriate client libs from (usually currentDesign)
pageRegion - PageRegion enum
Returns:
an ordered array of client library category names

getJsLibraries

String[] getJsLibraries(com.day.cq.wcm.api.designer.Design design,

Returns an ordered list of all JS (as specified on the Design page) client libraries associated with the pageRegion for the design

Parameters:

pageRegion - PageRegion enum
Returns:
an ordered array of client library category names

getLibraries

String[] getLibraries(com.day.cq.wcm.api.designer.Design design,
                      PageRegion pageRegion)
Returns an ordered list of all (CSS and JS; as specified on the Design page) client libraries associated with the pageRegion for the design

Parameters:
design - the Design to look up appropriate client libs from (usually currentDesign)
pageRegion - PageRegion enum
Returns:
an ordered array of client library category names
